text: Ani akasance va jaminice sarva kahi allahaceca ahe ani amhi tumacya purvice loka, jyanna grantha dila gela hota, tyanna ani tumhala haca adesa dila ki allahace bhaya rakha ani jara tumhi manale nahi tara nihsansaya je kahi akasammadhye va jaminivara ahe sarva allahaceca ahe ani allaha konaci garaja nasalela, prasansaniya ahe
